title: Welcome to react using react-i18next

hero.title: Enterprise Resource Planning Systems
hero.description: Integrated Odoo and ERPNext solutions to manage your business efficiently

about-sec.title: Who are we at TRP?
about-sec.paragraph1: At TRP, we specialize in providing integrated IT solutions for businesses.
about-sec.paragraph2: We focus on implementing and customizing ERP systems such as Odoo and ERPNext to meet your unique business needs.
about-sec.paragraph3: In addition, we offer custom software development services, hosting solutions, and professional business analysis services.
about-sec.highlightText: we help you digitize and automate your business processes, enhance operational efficiency, and achieve a real competitive advantage in the market by leveraging the latest technologies.

coreServicesDesc: We provide a comprehensive range of technology services tailored to your business needs.

servicescard.title: Enterprise Resource Planning
servicescard.desc: Comprehensive solutions for implementing and customizing Odoo and ERPNext systems.
servicescard.details: With the rapid digital transformation in Saudi Arabia, ERP systems have become a strategic tool for managing resources, improving operational efficiency, and supporting data-driven decision-making. We provide customizable Odoo and ERPNext solutions with full training and operational sustainability.

servicescard.title: Custom Software Development
servicescard.desc: Websites, mobile apps, and integrated software solutions tailored to your needs.
servicescard.details: We build innovative software solutions ranging from interactive websites to mobile apps and customized management systems. Each project is developed using the latest technologies, aligned with the Saudi market needs, ensuring ease of use and seamless integration.

servicescard.title: Hosting & Servers
servicescard.desc: Reliable hosting, virtual servers, and domains for smooth business operations.
servicescard.details: We provide fast, secure hosting and virtual servers to ensure your business runs without interruption. Our services include full domain management, monitoring, and advanced security measures.

servicescard.title: Digital Transformation
servicescard.desc: Strategies and plans to transform your business into a fully digital environment.
servicescard.details: We help Saudi organizations transition into smart digital ecosystems by designing tailored digital transformation strategies, optimizing processes, automating workflows, and adopting modern technologies aligned with Vision 2030.

servicescard.title: E-commerce Solutions
servicescard.desc: Professional online stores with integrated payment and shipping systems.
servicescard.details: We develop comprehensive e-commerce platforms that provide a seamless customer experience from browsing to checkout. Our solutions support both local and international payment gateways, along with trusted Saudi shipping providers.

servicescard.title: AI & Data Analytics
servicescard.desc: Smart services for data analysis and market trend prediction.
servicescard.details: We apply AI technologies to deliver accurate insights that support strategic decision-making. Our services include data analytics, predictive models, and smart automation to drive your business growth.

servicescard.title: UI/UX Design
servicescard.desc: Modern designs that ensure usability and customer engagement.
servicescard.details: We design interactive user interfaces and smooth user experiences that reflect your brand identity and enhance customer satisfaction. Our solutions are built using the latest design standards and optimized for all devices.

servicescard.title: Cybersecurity
servicescard.desc: Protecting your data and infrastructure from threats and attacks.
servicescard.details: We provide comprehensive cybersecurity solutions, including penetration testing, network monitoring, and advanced protection systems to ensure data confidentiality and integrity, aligned with global standards.

servicescard.title: Training & Capacity Building
servicescard.desc: Technical training courses to empower your staff to use systems efficiently.
servicescard.details: We offer practical training programs covering various technical fields such as ERP, software development, cybersecurity, and data analytics. Our goal is to build a capable internal team to manage and operate your systems effectively.

servicescard.title: Technical Consulting
servicescard.desc: Expert consultancy to support effective technology decisions.
servicescard.details: We provide specialized consulting services to help you choose the right solutions, plan technical strategies, and maximize your digital resources while reducing costs and risks.

servicesexp_subtitle: TRP’s integrated services to meet your business needs
servicesexp_description: All your technical needs... in one platform
